heading: Robot Teachers
description: Robot Teachers are great for niche purposes, but not to replace the complex functions human teachers can provide, yet.

heading: Throw Your TV Off A Cliff
description: Friends of mine seperate into (1) CS majors, (2) good programmers, and (3) great programmers. Being a CS major with a 4.0 GPA is not enough, but we can become great if we throw the TV off a cliff.

heading: The Grinch Who Stole 2021
description: 2021 easily classifies as the worst year of my short life, but was it? There are many people who dug the gold from the trenches life put them in and we could join their ranks with some reflection.

heading: Finding the silver lining‚Äôs cloud
description: With mental health plummeting in the digital age, it is importatnt to keep perspective and see people as humans, not unfallable statues. This is unmasking Anri for anyone who thinks he is admirable.

heading: Crawling inside a young scientist mind
description: Can't stop it from thinking, so might as well let it out. In 60 years my gray-haired self wants to reflect on how well these thoughts were adressed.

heading: The Good Friend
